entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Wynyard
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -17.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wynyard 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
Temperature: -17.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -20.3°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
